item.title: Implementing a Trading Algorithm
item.description: The Project: By late 2020, a close friend of mine asked for help implementing a trading strategy he had thought of. I eagerly accepted the challenge. I can’t say, however, that I expected it to be extremely profitable. His idea was so simple, it was difficult to believe that it would fare well in a market filled with sophisticated trading algorithms. But, well.. it turned out to do just that.
